allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: WooCommerce Loyalty, Referral & Gamification Suite v3.0.1

Complete loyalty ecosystem with 13+ features:
- 6-tier loyalty with automatic discounts
- XP engine, levels, badges, leaderboard, spin wheel
- Video referral system with dual-sided rewards
- Affiliate tracking with tiered & recurring commissions
- Points shop, login streaks, birthday rewards, milestones
- 18 REST API endpoints, 11 email templates, GDPR compliance
- 73 security & quality fixes \(atomic guards, XSS prevention\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash("C:\\Program Files\\GitHub CLI\\gh.exe" repo create woocommerce-loyalty-referral-gamification --public --description "The most complete WooCommerce loyalty ecosystem. 6-tier loyalty, XP gamification, video referrals, affiliate tracking, spin wheel, badges, leaderboard, and 13+ engagement features. Security-hardened with 73 fixes." --source "C:\\Users\\dell\\Desktop\\gorilla-loyalty-referral-v2" --remote origin --push)
